map.display_value: Transform Supplier V2 - Supplier Payment Information

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_entry_552501e287f56950ecfb322e0ebb351e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>reject</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Transform Supplier V2 - Supplier Payment Information">78f5a0e687756950ecfb322e0ebb3507</map><reference_value_field>sys_id</reference_value_field><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

    var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_fin_supplier');
    gr.addQuery('erp_company_code', source.account_number_of_vendor_or_creditor);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        return gr.getUniqueValue();
    }

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>sn_sap_data_int_supplier_stg</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prama</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-28 11:26:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>552501e287f56950ecfb322e0ebb351e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP" source="sn_sap_data_int">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_552501e287f56950ecfb322e0ebb351e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Prama</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-03 14:43:59</sys_updated_on><target_field>supplier</target_field><target_table>sn_fin_supplier_payment</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
